cast.overview: As a math savant uncooks the books for a new client, the Treasury Department closes in on his activities and the body count starts to rise.
cast.title: The Accountant

cast.overview: The true story of how Ray Kroc, a salesman from Illinois, met Mac and Dick McDonald, who were running a burger operation in 1950s Southern California. Kroc was impressed by the brothers’ speedy system of making the food and saw franchise potential. He maneuvered himself into a position to be able to pull the company from the brothers and create a billion-dollar empire.
cast.title: The Founder

details.biography: Randall Taylor is an Actor who began his career in musical and classical theatre, performing in plays from Shakespeare to The Rainmaker to Camelot. Born the son of a Baptist preacher in West Texas, and partially raised in Tuscaloosa, Alabama, his family moved northward to Illinois after having a cross burned in their yard because of his father's preaching against segregation. It is there in the mid western town of Carbondale that he discovered his passion for performing, studying in the theatre program at Southern Illinois University. His professional career includes roles in Television shows such as Homeland, House of Cards and Vampire Diaries and Films such as The Founder, The Accountant, Robocop III and Rings.
details.name: Randall Taylor
